title: Web Development Self-Learning Plan
description: A 4-week self-learning plan to gain foundational web development skills.

weeks.title: Introduction to Web Development
learningObjectives: Understand the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Learn how to set up a development environment
Create a simple web page using HTML and CSS
topicsToCover: JavaScript variables, data types, and functions
weeklyTasks: Complete online tutorials on HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Build a simple web page with a header, body, and footer

weeks.title: Responsive Web Design
learningObjectives: Understand the principles of responsive web design
Learn how to use CSS media queries and flexbox
Create a responsive web page that adapts to different screen sizes
weeklyTasks: Complete online tutorials on responsive web design
Modify the web page from Week 1 to be responsive

weeks.title: JavaScript Fundamentals
learningObjectives: Understand the core concepts of JavaScript
Learn how to manipulate the DOM using JavaScript
Implement basic interactivity on web pages
weeklyTasks: Complete online tutorials on JavaScript fundamentals
Add interactivity to the responsive web page from Week 2

weeks.title: Putting It All Together
learningObjectives: Integrate HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build a complete web application
Understand the basics of web development frameworks and libraries
Deploy the web application to a hosting platform
topicsToCover: Web development frameworks (e.g., React, Angular, Vue.js)
weeklyTasks: Build a small web application using a framework or library
Deploy the web application to a hosting platform
Reflect on the learning process and plan for future growth
